name: Stick and Shoot
description:
Use the left mouse button to eject the ball.

      After getting the ring and touching the statue to recharge it, you can use the right mouse button to launch the red ball to change the direction of the ball ejection, the ball can refresh the ability to launch the red ball if it touches the special square in the middle.

      If you get stuck in image 2, press G to teleport to the next archive point.

      使用鼠标左键弹射小球，获得戒指并触碰雕像充能后可以使用鼠标右键发射红色小球改变小球弹射方向，小球如果中途触碰到特殊方块可以刷新发射红球能力。如果在图2卡住，按G传送到下一个存档点。

image 1: special square

image 2: stuck scene
